_sText:
Map by Julien269 - I'd like to start by thanking everyone that helped with beta testing this. It took over 8 beta tests to make it the way I wanted it and a lot of patience from the testers too :D The map is a supermarket located in Costa Rica where I used to live for a part of my life, hence the poverty ambiance that's in this project. It's a fairly medium sized map, that reminds me a bit to the good ol' cs_assault in CS 1.6. Both teams have fair starts and no team has advantage over the other. After crawling testing user-made maps, I just wasn't satisfied enough with the quality that was involved in them *bangs head on the screen*... Most of the maps totally lacked of concept in them; some were unplayable, not fun, others just plain ugly to even look at. I may not be the best mapper out there, but at least I've contributed to the community with a decent map that I think a lot of people will enjoy. The testers had a great time in it, so did I... As a final note, I'll be teaming with some highly competent concept ideators on a next upcoming project. The map will be much bigger than this one. But that's another story... There is also a dedicated server available once in a while on a 24/7 rotation with the map at the following adress: 67.68.124.160:27015 **************************************** OTHER INFORMATION Project Name: cs_mercado Started on: march 28th, 2005 Completed on: april 7th, 2005 Game: Half-Life 2 Mod: Counter-Strike: Source Aprox. total time spent on the project: 70 hours. Number of Beta tests: 8 Editor: Hammer 4.0 Developper(s): Julien269 Web Site: www.julien269.com Contact: julien269@hotmail.com ****************************************
Source: http://www.cstrike-planet.com/maps/550 Notes: This is a map from 2005, and has been running on my clan's custom map server pretty much since release. It's one of my favorite maps, even nowadays. I was suprised when I saw it wasn't on FPS Banana, so here it is. Included in the rar file is the .bsp and a bzip2 compressed version for server admins with a fast download server. Recommended # of players: 18-20 Maximum # of players: 32
